thread.title: 'Harapan will reform public service if it wins Putrajaya'
thread.title_full: 'Harapan will reform public service if it wins Putrajaya'

title: 'Harapan will reform public service if it wins Putrajaya'
text:
More 
Pakatan Harapan's main agenda will be to reform the public service if it wins the next general elections, said its chief secretary Saifuddin Abdullah. 
"If we were to win Putrajaya, the first thing we will do is to prepare a white paper on reforming the public service," he said at a economic governance forum today. 
Saifuddin said the white paper will then be tabled in Parliament for approval. 
"The public service deserves the kind of attention from the highest decision making (body)," he said, adding that all major stakeholders will be included in the process.
